messages.subject: Re: Shinsengumi Haori Anyone?
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, Feel free to give us the dev-art link once you are done.  I can paste your message to the Shinsengumi LJ blog as well. For me personally, I can t buy a
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

Feel free to give us the dev-art link once you are done. I can paste
your message to the Shinsengumi LJ blog as well.

For me personally, I can't buy a haori at this time---I just spent
money on something else recently.

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Bunny ^_^ <shenlong71328@...> wrote:
>
> Hey all!
>
> To put things bluntly, I was wondering about making Shinsengumi
haori and selling them.   Would any of the members of this mailing
list be interested in getting one if I offer them?   I figure that
this would be the best place to offer something like this.   I
already made one that I wore everyday at the Anime Expo this last
weekend and I plan on putting pictures up online on my DeviantArt
page.
>
> As of now, this is just a hypothesis.   I just want to see what
your opinions are and if anyone would be interested.
>
> -Bunneh
> ^_______^
>
>
>
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>

messages.subject: Shinsengumi Haori Anyone?
messages.msgSnippet: Hey all! To put things bluntly, I was wondering about making Shinsengumi haori and selling them.   Would any of the members of this mailing list be interested
messages.messageBody:
Hey all!

To put things bluntly, I was wondering about making Shinsengumi haori and selling them.   Would any of the members of this mailing list be interested in getting one if I offer them?   I figure that this would be the best place to offer something like this.   I already made one that I wore everyday at the Anime Expo this last weekend and I plan on putting pictures up online on my DeviantArt page.

As of now, this is just a hypothesis.   I just want to see what your opinions are and if anyone would be interested.

-Bunneh
^_______^





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
